verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

זֹ֚את <S%H2063><s%> likewise חֻקַּ֣ת <S%H2708><s%> This [is] the ordinance הַתּוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> of the law אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying דַּבֵּ֣ר ׀ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיִקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> that they bring אֵלֶיךָ֩ <S%H413><s%> about פָרָ֨ה <S%H6510><s%> heifer אֲדֻמָּ֜ה <S%H122><s%> thee a red תְּמִימָ֗ה <S%H8549><s%> without spot אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> is no בָּהּ֙ מ֔וּם <S%H3971><s%> wherein [is] no blemish אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> [and] upon which never עָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> came עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and עֹֽל׃ <S%H5923><s%> yoke

וּנְתַתֶּ֣ם <S%H5414><s%> And ye shall give אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> her unto Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְהוֹצִ֤יא <S%H3318><s%> that he may bring her forth אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp וְשָׁחַ֥ט <S%H7819><s%> and [one] shall slay אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> her before

וְלָקַ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take אֶלְעָזָ֧ר <S%H499><s%> And Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest מִדָּמָ֖הּ <S%H1818><s%> of her blood בְּאֶצְבָּע֑וֹ <S%H676><s%> with his finger וְהִזָּ֞ה <S%H5137><s%> and sprinkle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward נֹ֨כַח <S%H5227><s%> directly פְּנֵ֧י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֛ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation מִדָּמָ֖הּ <S%H1818><s%> of her blood שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִֽים׃ <S%H6471><s%> times

וְשָׂרַ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> And [one] shall burn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּרָ֖ה <S%H6510><s%> the heifer לְעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> in his sight אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹרָ֤הּ <S%H5785><s%> her skin וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂרָהּ֙ <S%H1320><s%> and her flesh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמָ֔הּ <S%H1818><s%> and her blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with פִּרְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H6569><s%> with her dung יִשְׂרֹֽף׃ <S%H8313><s%> shall he burn

וְלָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> wood אֶ֛רֶז <S%H730><s%> cedar וְאֵז֖וֹב <S%H231><s%> and hyssop וּשְׁנִ֣י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet תוֹלָ֑עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor וְהִשְׁלִ֕יךְ <S%H7993><s%> and cast אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into תּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [it] into the midst שְׂרֵפַ֥ת <S%H8316><s%> of the burning הַפָּרָֽה׃ <S%H6510><s%> of the heifer

וְכִבֶּ֨ס <S%H3526><s%> shall wash בְּגָדָ֜יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> Then the priest וְרָחַ֤ץ <S%H7364><s%> and he shall bathe בְּשָׂרוֹ֙ <S%H1320><s%> his flesh בַּמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> and afterward יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> he shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> into the camp וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְהַשֹּׂרֵ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> And he that burneth אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> יְכַבֵּ֤ס <S%H3526><s%> her shall wash בְּגָדָיו֙ <S%H899><s%> his clothes בַּמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <S%H1320><s%> his flesh בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water וְטָמֵ֖א <S%H2930><s%> and shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְאָסַ֣ף ׀ <S%H622><s%> shall gather אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And a man טָה֗וֹר <S%H2889><s%> [that is] clean אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> אֵ֣פֶר <S%H665><s%> up the ashes הַפָּרָ֔ה <S%H6510><s%> of the heifer וְהִנִּ֛יחַ <S%H3240><s%> and lay [them] up מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp בְּמָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place טָה֑וֹר <S%H2889><s%> in a clean וְ֠הָיְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become לַעֲדַ֨ת <S%H5712><s%> for the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְמִשְׁמֶ֛רֶת <S%H4931><s%> and it shall be kept לְמֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> for a water נִדָּ֖ה <S%H5079><s%> of separation חַטָּ֥את <S%H2403><s%> it [is] a purification for sin הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְ֠כִבֶּס <S%H3526><s%> shall wash הָאֹסֵ֨ף <S%H622><s%> And he that gathereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֤פֶר <S%H665><s%> the ashes הַפָּרָה֙ <S%H6510><s%> of the heifer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָ֔יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְטָמֵ֖א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> until the even וְֽהָיְתָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> become לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and it shall be unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלַגֵּ֛ר <S%H1616><s%> and unto the stranger הַגָּ֥ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכָ֖ם <S%H8432><s%> among לְחֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> them for a statute עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> He that toucheth בְּמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> the dead לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> body אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of any man וְטָמֵ֖א <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> one יִתְחַטָּא־ <S%H2398><s%> He shall purify ב֞וֹ בַּיּ֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֛י <S%H7992><s%> himself with it on the third וּבַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> and on the seventh יִטְהָ֑ר <S%H2891><s%> he shall be clean וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> from יִתְחַטָּ֜א <S%H2398><s%> but if he purify בַּיּ֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֛י <S%H7992><s%> not himself the third וּבַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> then the seventh לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִטְהָֽר׃ <S%H2891><s%> he shall not be clean

כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> Anyone הַנֹּגֵ֡עַ <S%H5060><s%> Whosoever toucheth בְּמֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> the dead בְּנֶפֶשׁ֩ <S%H5315><s%> body הָאָדָ֨ם <S%H120><s%> of any man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יָמ֜וּת <S%H4191><s%> that is dead וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not יִתְחַטָּ֗א <S%H2398><s%> and purifieth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁכַּ֤ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God טִמֵּ֔א <S%H2930><s%> not himself defileth וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and that soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> from Israel כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> Because מֵ֨י <S%H4325><s%> because the water נִדָּ֜ה <S%H5079><s%> of separation לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> was not זֹרַ֤ק <S%H2236><s%> was not sprinkled עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> on טָמֵ֣א <S%H2931><s%> upon him he shall be unclean יִהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is still טֻמְאָת֥וֹ <S%H2932><s%> his uncleanness בֽוֹ׃

זֹ֚את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הַתּוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> This [is] the law אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> when a man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when יָמ֣וּת <S%H4191><s%> dieth בְּאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> in a tent כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone הַבָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> all that come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאֹ֙הֶל֙ <S%H168><s%> into the tent וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everyone אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בָּאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> and all that [is] in the tent יִטְמָ֖א <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> Every כְּלִ֣י <S%H3627><s%> vessel פָת֔וּחַ <S%H6605><s%> And every open אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> has צָמִ֥יד <S%H6781><s%> which hath no covering פָּתִ֖יל <S%H6616><s%> bound עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> on טָמֵ֖א <S%H2931><s%> upon it [is] unclean הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> anyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִגַּ֜ע <S%H5060><s%> And whosoever toucheth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> in the open הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> fields בַּֽחֲלַל־ <S%H2491><s%> one that is slain חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> with a sword א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְמֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> or a dead body אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or בְעֶ֥צֶם <S%H6106><s%> or a bone אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of a man א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְקָ֑בֶר <S%H6913><s%> or a grave יִטְמָ֖א <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וְלָֽקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> [person] they shall take לַטָּמֵ֔א <S%H2931><s%> And for an unclean מֵעֲפַ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> of the ashes שְׂרֵפַ֣ת <S%H8316><s%> of the burnt heifer הַֽחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> of purification for sin וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> shall be put עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> water חַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> and running אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כֶּֽלִי׃ <S%H3627><s%> thereto in a vessel

וְלָקַ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take אֵז֜וֹב <S%H231><s%> hyssop וְטָבַ֣ל <S%H2881><s%> and dip בַּמַּיִם֮ <S%H4325><s%> [it] in the water אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> person טָהוֹר֒ <S%H2889><s%> And a clean וְהִזָּ֤ה <S%H5137><s%> and sprinkle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאֹ֙הֶל֙ <S%H168><s%> [it] upon the tent וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכֵּלִ֔ים <S%H3627><s%> and upon all the vessels וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on הַנְּפָשׁ֖וֹת <S%H5315><s%> and upon the persons אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who הָֽיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> were there וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַנֹּגֵ֗עַ <S%H5060><s%> that were there and upon him that touched בַּעֶ֙צֶם֙ <S%H6106><s%> a bone א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בֶֽחָלָ֔ל <S%H2491><s%> or one slain א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בַמֵּ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> or one dead א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בַקָּֽבֶר׃ <S%H6913><s%> or a grave
